website_summaries.verdict: Reasonably good build quality for a jersey frame with UV protection in the clear door.
pros: Fits smaller sizes of jerseys better than large ones with interior dimensions of 31.5 by 23.5 inches
Clear acrylic door has a 98% UV protection level
Felt background in the interior allows for pinning of materials if desired

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, but sometimes that's OK
customer_reviews.text: Over all this is a nice looking shadow box, the glass is thin plexiglass but not so thin that you would call it terrible. My plexiglass was not attached at the top but I was ready to hang a jersey so I decided just to deal with it. The frame looks wonderful but its lacking high quality. I'd say this is a medium quality frame for a medium quality price. Works for me to hang a jersey I won at a fundraiser silent auction.
customer_reviews.author: Mark I

customer_reviews.title: Jersey Case
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and packaged well. Though for it to be hung I did have to buy my own screws because the ones it came with didn’t do the job. Aside from that the frame is solid and worked for what I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha K.

customer_reviews.title: this frame can look good. First off throw away the hanger and take ...
customer_reviews.text: When done right, this frame can look good. First off throw away the hanger and take out the hanging screw, looks cheap. If you take your time and pin it down it can definitly make this at first cheap frame feel more expensive. Solid buy
customer_reviews.author: Christian Matthews

customer_reviews.title: were to find keys/hanginh hardware
customer_reviews.text: was very happy with display cases - both intact - as far as the keys/hanging hardware- it was taped to the back of the foam packing corner so almost threw it out thinking I needed to buy mounting hardware when it was actually included. Easy to mount and holes for the hanging hardware was pre-drilled on the back which is a plus!! used acid free mounting board to mount jersey for smooth look and it looks great!! I have another display case coming in cherry wood. Would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Foust

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Used the case to display my Brooks Robinson jersey and cards. Wish I had ordered the wider display but as it was my first time, I didn't know. However by following some youtube videos, I was able to mount my items and if I do say so, looks professionally displayed. The quality is great and took couple of minutes to screw the rear mounting brackets on. Would definitely recommend this (especially at the price I paid) and will buy more as my baseball jersey collection builds.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ward

customer_reviews.title: Display your favs with ease!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent piece to display your jerseys! I was really impressed with the quality for the price. And it has a key/lock! Super easy to hang jersey!!
customer_reviews.author: Nana D

customer_reviews.title: however
customer_reviews.text: Love the case, easy to use, light to pick up however..... They only gave me 1 screw out of the 8 I was supposed to get so I had to try to match the screw so I could hang it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kleman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality/product.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! I’m all about quality and it’s very good quality to me. The price is great and fits my jersey almost perfect. The jersey I bought was huge and still fits nicely. I’m always hesitant to buying things online because you never know the quality but I like it so much I bought another signed jersey and I’m getting this exact case again for it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Came as expected the glass the framework everything was perfect the only issue I had was that the cloth ...
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected the glass the framework everything was perfect the only issue I had was that the cloth on the back of the frame overlap but because that is hidden from the wall it was not a big concern. I'm giving it 4 out of 5 Stars mainly because the price was a bit High
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item to display signed concert shirt
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item to display my signed Shakira concert t-shirt. Very easy to set up... even without directions. By the way there are no directions included.
customer_reviews.author: D Trouble

customer_reviews.title: This price can’t be beat!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, I am not sure there is a better jersey frame out there. It fits a Basketball Jersey a bit better than football. Bought I have bought three of these now and am incredibly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: RupertPupkin

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: Quality is on par with price. I purchased 3 of them and I am happy with all 3. Quality display case.
customer_reviews.author: mjs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Frame
customer_reviews.text: This display case makes my autograph jersey look awesome. Case is built well and looks good. Comes with everything needed to hang and place your jersey. The price is at a great low price and will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Hoot

customer_reviews.title: Quality in Display
customer_reviews.text: Very nice display case, the lock and key feature is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: ASHURA

customer_reviews.title: Bunched up and looks like crap.
customer_reviews.text: Claims to work for hockey jerseys. Put an XL jersey in there and it doesn't fit. Bunched up and looks like crap.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Buchwald

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A great quality for a good deal! I pinned my son's MLS Jersey in this case and it looks almost professional!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product. Impossible to mount without hardware that didn't come with product
customer_reviews.text: Did not either see or receive mounting hardware. Impossible to mount without hardware due to the back frame being so narrow. One of the "locks" wouldn't close all of the way. I highly discourage against purchasing this. Would give 0 stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: No keys for locks or mounting kit
customer_reviews.text: This product does come with locks, but no keys to use the locks also does not come with any way to mount/hang on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Grygiel

customer_reviews.title: Fits also well for Soccer Jerseys, great product and very well packed.
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this purchase. Package arrived before expected even considering it was shipped to Switzerland. It was really well done packaging, protecting the display cabinet and glass for this long trip. The product is exactly as I expected, to put my soccer jersey, with very good quality and look. Just pay attention on the size as for NFL jersey , I would recommend the XL Display case cabinet instead, but for soccer jerseys this size is ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Matos

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking frames for my autographed hockey sweaters and football ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking frames for my autographed hockey sweaters and football jerseys.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great item, just more costly than what I wanted or needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No key. No support.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 before this one. Everything came. This time. No key for the lock. Nothing to mount the display. Won’t be buying this shadow box again.
customer_reviews.author: j love

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that perfectly fits sports jersey. Very nicely made, sturdy and comes with lock and hanger for jersey.
customer_reviews.author: NorCal

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as directed. Nice product. Nothing amazing about it. Not sure if it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: bradd

customer_reviews.title: removing paper and film on front.  no hook to hang
customer_reviews.text: perfect for what i needed. however, the instructions to remove film on top didn't work. what worked was olive oil smeared all over the paper and sticky underlay. leave on for a few mins. and both remove easily. also, no hook on back to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: The black frame looks good! I used for a college jersey of mine. I didn’t receive the key to lock it but that isn’t important to me it still latches. I got it pretty fast and it was packaged safely. I’m considering buying another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Great frame for displaying favorite player's jersey.
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes the frame for the jersey he has to display. Is not for really expensive signed apparel, but if you just have a jersey of your favorite player this frame works well. The only thing we would recommend is buy different screws. The ones provided are made out of really soft metal and strip real easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing instructions
customer_reviews.text: My only problem is that it's missing instructions on how too connect the hanger too the back of the display. Still haven't heard from them. Will not buy anything else from them.
customer_reviews.author: William Moser

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 13 of them now. They are very nice frames. They really display my collection well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the display frame, would definitely recommend buying this frame for any type of jerseys. Included jersey hanger, pin board, and keys for your case.

customer_reviews.title: I think ahead
customer_reviews.text: Perfect way to display a jersey. Now, I just need a jersey.

customer_reviews.title: Came Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered three of these display cases and all were of good quality except for the last one I received. It was delivered with scratches on the glass front and spots where the foam padding stuck to the glass. Sadly, I need three more of these but do not know if I will order any additional.
customer_reviews.author: Eweber

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DISPLAY CASE
customer_reviews.text: GREAT display case! My "women's" jersey fits, with some room at the bottom for some photos and tickets. Customer Service with this product is Exceptional!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight but not so much that it looks fake! Arrived before expected and exactly as described in the information. We actually bought one more after this was delivered!

customer_reviews.title: This frame is high quality and it looks great. It was easy to frame my jersey and ...
customer_reviews.text: This frame is high quality and it looks great. It was easy to frame my jersey and it looks fantastic.

customer_reviews.title: great case! used it to displayed my autographed Larry ...
customer_reviews.text: great case! used it to displayed my autographed Larry Fitzgerald jersey and it looks awesome! gets compliments all the time from friends

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: material is alright but a perfect for anykind of jerseys, soccer football hockey basketball etc

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed my hubby on his birthday!
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet was beautiful. However, the glass was scratched all over & the packaging left marks that I was unable to remove. Will probably have to send it back, or get the glass replaced.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great Jersey shadow box! It shipped quickly, came packaged really good for being fragile, and pining the jersey was really quick and easy. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: David Hale

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This display cabinet is really nice. It was bigger than I thought and was perfect for displaying my son's black belt and uniform.

customer_reviews.title: I wish there was less space between the back and ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was less space between the back and the glass. This would allow for less wrinkles in the jersey and a much cleaner look. Definitely made for larger jerseys.

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Very good quality and beautiful finish. It arrived early,3 to 4 days. My son in law is gonna love this for Christmas!

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, correct team, the size fit exactly as it should, brand new, clean. Great shipping time, all in all no complaints

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case!
customer_reviews.text: Love the display case although it came with no instructions

customer_reviews.text: .It was delivered in a quick manner and at a fair price

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

Comes with everything you need, even pins for pinning in the jersey, it looks very nice, can't beat it for this price!

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy for the price

So I ended up putting Iversons college jersey in it. I recommend knowing the dimensions of your jersey so you don't end up in the same predicament I was in.

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: This case was exactly what I was looking for! Great quality for an amazing price! I'm going to order 2 more.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful display
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend to display his football jerseys. He can change them easily and it looks great on the wall. Good purchase

customer_reviews.title: ... son's college football jersey in and couldn't have been happier. It's very well made and easy to mount ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put my son's college football jersey in and couldn't have been happier. It's very well made and easy to mount whatever jersey you want, love the oak finish.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good customer service. I fit an old 1980's style nylon baseball jacket signed with no problem. This is an original from that era, so about 30 years old. It's not super puffy like a new one, but still thicker than a jersey. I don't think something like a letterman's jacket would fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas. He has a signed Chris Mullins Warriors jersey. I confiscated it and it now resides in the frame and in a wrapped box for Christmas. The frame is strudy, all the parts were there, no damage in shipping. Perfect fit, I recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great frames if you're on a budget
customer_reviews.text: After spending lots of time looking at different frames for size XL (52) hockey jerseys, I finally decided to go with this one. If you're on a budget and need something nice to display your favorite jerseys, highly recommend this frame. I displayed my jerseys backwards to show the player name/number, and with a little folding to the sleeves, they look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality - Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Very pleased with the quality, price, and delivery.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

product_meta.title: 98% UV Protection - Baseball/Football/Basketball/Soccer/Hockey Jersey Display Case Shadowbox Wall Mount
product_meta.description:
Hand made from imported Australian beech wood. This furniture grade Jersey/Uniform Display case is of beautiful design and construction, very detailed and attractive, but also very affordable. Perfect for displaying any type of sports jerseys. Baseball, Basketball, Football, Soccer, Hockey etc etc. 

Display case comes standard with 98% UV acrylic door, protects your item from fading. A must have if you have autographed memorabilia going inside. The door frame includes heavy duty lockable latches with keys. This will give your case a little extra security and keep unwanted dust from your prized items. 

Display case has a acid free black felt lining inside. Giving you great contrast to your item. The background on the case is pinnable, allowing you to pin your item down if you choose to. Or attach other misc items, like pennants, photos, ticket stubs, etc etc. Display case is setup to attach either vertically or horizontally, giving you the flexibility you need to display your items either direction. 

Case comes fully assembled. Unit Weight: 12 lbs. Dimensions: 31.5"H X 23.5"W X 2"D (items inside case shown not included)




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :31.5 x 23.62 x 2.01 inches; 13.8 Pounds
 * Date First Available :April 17, 2015
 * Manufacturer :sfDisplay.com,LLC.
 * ASIN :B00WAKK9CW

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #54,852 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #4586 inSports Accessories 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars247 ratings Hand made from imported Australian beech wood. Display case has a acid free black felt lining inside. Giving you great contrast to your item. The background on the case is pinnable, allowing you to pin your item down if you choose to. Or attach other misc items, like pennants, photos, ticket stubs, etc etc. Display case is setup to attach either vertically or horizontally, giving you the flexibility you need to display your items either direction. 

Case comes fully assembled. Unit Weight: 12 lbs. Dimensions: 31.5"H X 23.5"W X 2"D (items inside case shown not included)
feature_bullets: Handcrafted in solid furniture grade beech hardwood with elegant finish.
98% UV Ultra Clear Protected Acrylic Door - Lockable Latches
Pinnable Black Felt Background / Matching Wood Hanger Included
Fully Assembled With All Mounting Included.
